sentences.en: He could no longer resist the urge to go and see Amanda.
sentences.cn: 他再也抑制不住去看阿曼达的冲动。

sentences.en: He forced back the strong urge to stroke her.
sentences.cn: 他抑制住想要抚摩她的强烈冲动.

sentences.en: He fought with the urge to smoke one of the cigars he'd given up awhile ago.
sentences.cn: 他努力克制自己的烟瘾，不去抽一支戒掉没多久的雪茄。

sentences.en: He had an urge to open a shop of his own.
sentences.cn: 他很想自己开一家店。

sentences.en: He has an urge to become a cinema star.
sentences.cn: 他渴望当一名电影明星.

sentences.en: He urged her forward, his hand under her elbow.
sentences.cn: 他托着她的胳膊肘，推她往前走。

sentences.en: I desperately fought the urge to giggle.
sentences.cn: 我拼命地想忍住笑。

sentences.en: I felt an irresistible urge to laugh.
sentences.cn: 我禁不住想笑出来。

sentences.en: I got a note from Moira urging me to get in touch.
sentences.cn: 我收到莫伊拉的一封短信，一定要我保持联系。

sentences.en: I had an uncontrollable urge to laugh.
sentences.cn: 我忍不住想笑。

sentences.en: Once inside her apartment she felt an urge to brush her teeth.
sentences.cn: 一回到自己的公寓，她就有一种想要刷牙的冲动。

sentences.en: The charity urged quick action.
sentences.cn: 慈善机构敦促迅速采取行动。

sentences.en: The firm has taken out adverts in national newspapers to urge customers to return suspect products.
sentences.cn: 该公司在全国性的报纸上登出广告，催促顾客退回疑似假冒产品。

sentences.en: The police have the same human urge for self-preservation as the rest of us.
sentences.cn: 警察和我们其他人一样，都有自我保护的人类本能。

sentences.en: The urge to fast-forward is almost irresistible.
sentences.cn: 快速进带的冲动几乎压制不住。

sentences.en: They urged Congress to approve plans for their reform programme.
sentences.cn: 他们敦促国会批准他们有关改革项目的计划。

sentences.en: We urge colleges and universities to demystify the selection process.
sentences.cn: 我们敦促各学院和大学澄清其甄选学生的过程。

sentences.en: We urge vigorous action to be taken immediately.
sentences.cn: 我们强烈要求立即采取有力措施。

sentences.en: What can we do to urge these lazy workers to greater production?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能鼓励这些懒惰的工人去努力增产 呢 ?

sentences.en: You must urge the children on or we'll never get home.
sentences.cn: 你必须催促孩子们赶路,不然我们永远也到不了家.

words.tran_cn: 强烈的欲望，迫切要求；推动力
催促;激励;促使;大力倡导

trans.tran_cn: 敦促，催促，推，拉，驱赶，强烈要求
trans.tran_en: formal to make someone or something move by shouting, pushing them etc

trans.tran_cn: 鼓励，激励；竭力主张，强烈要求；催促，力劝；使加速
trans.tran_en: to strongly suggest that someone does something
